result_list.explanation: Regardant à sa montre. - This indicates interaction with an object (a watch), so it falls under the 'object' category.
Il entend de Porcie. - This implies movement or action related to listening, so it falls under 'movement'.
Domitian entre. - This indicates a character entering the stage, so it falls under 'entrance'.
Air : Vivre sans amour. - This is a music description, so it falls under 'music'.
Le théâtre change, et représente les Champs Élysées. - This describes a change in the stage setting, so it falls under 'setting'.
result_list.stgdir: Le théâtre change, et représente les Champs Élysées.

result_list.explanation: Entrée de ballet de trois Pantomimes. - This indicates characters entering the stage, so it falls under 'entrance'.

result_list.explanation: À La Baronne. - This indicates the addressee of a speech, so it falls under 'toward'.
ENTRÉE. - This indicates a character entering the stage, so it falls under 'entrance'.
Avec colère. - This describes the delivery manner of the character, showing anger, so it falls under 'delivery'.
Il revient encore. - This indicates movement of the character, so it falls under 'movement'.
